About me

LinkedIn GitHub CV Email

I am an economic analyst, researcher and assistant lecturer at John von Neumann University. I love statistics, econometrics, ML and mostly R pogramming. This website is maintained to share lecture slides, materials related to my subject and blog posts about my actual research activities.
